storyContext.title: Implement Core Chat Interface
storyContext.story: As a frontend developer, I want to create the foundational chat interface components, so that users have the basic tools to interact with the chatbot in a clean, professional environment.
storyContext.productGoalAlignment: This story aims to provide users with basic tools to interact with the chatbot in a clean, professional environment, which is fundamental for user engagement and the chatbot's usability.

dependencies.dependency: shadcn/ui (for UI primitives like Input and Button)
Backend API (implied, for actual chatbot responses, though mocked for this story)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: A chat history panel is displayed when navigating to the chat page.
User and bot message bubbles are visually distinct (User: Primary Color/Teal, Bot: Neutral/Gray).
A "Loading..." indicator (subtle animation) appears while waiting for a response.
A text input field and "Send" button are present and functional.
